Has anyone else had PermGen memory errors with ant & Junit4 (using
junit4'2 Junit4Adapter() and a suite method) - I'm using a lot of
org.junitParameterized tests and have had problems running my full test
suite from ant (when I run them in eclipse 3.2 using the builtin junit4
runners there's no apparent problem (though I'm getting loads of crashes
but that's a separate problem).

My workaround has been to up the Permgen space for java when running
ant... but wondering why this should be (and don't know that this is
specifically a junit4 problem, but I never had this issue when I was
using junit3.8)

(and from my researches PermGen seems to be connected with classloading
issues - running out of space because of either leaks in classloaders,
or simply loads of loaded classes - on windows sun's jdk 1.5_06 had lots
of issues with this, but unfortunately the problem still occurs under
1.5_07 and under BSD diablo - when running cruisecontrol).

any suggestions or pointers helpful.

thanks

Tim
